headline: The Hartford (HIG) Earnings Beat: Margin Expansion Reinforces Value Narrative Despite Slower Growth Outlook
summary: Hartford Insurance Group (HIG) delivered earnings growth of 17.6% over the past year, outpacing its five-year average annual growth of 12.9%. Net profit margins improved to 12.7% from last year’s 11.5%, supporting the case for high earnings quality amid a period of favorable historical profitability and reasonable valuation. Investors will note that despite strong results so far, forward growth expectations are more muted compared to the broader US market, which adds nuance for those weighing...
